header: The Twelve Disciples; Instructions for Service

verse: Jesus summoned His twelve disciples and gave them authority over unclean spirits, to cast them out, and to heal every disease and every sickness.
Now the names of the twelve apostles are these: The first, Simon, who is called Peter, and his brother Andrew; and James the son of Zebedee, and his brother John;
Philip and Bartholomew; Thomas and Matthew the tax collector; James the son of Alphaeus, and Thaddaeus;
Simon the Zealot, and Judas Iscariot, the one who also betrayed Him.
These twelve Jesus sent out after instructing them, saying, â€œDo not go on a road to Gentiles, and do not enter a city of Samaritans;

header: A Hard Road Ahead of Them
